messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] unschooling DH
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you so much.  I just submitted my request for membership. ... From: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com [mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com] On
messages.messageBody:
Thank you so much. I just submitted my request for membership.


-----Original Message-----
From: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
kbcdlovejo@...
Sent: Sunday, February 24, 2008 10:09 AM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] unschooling DH



-----Original Message-----
From: cocoandmia <cristina-pertierra@
<mailto:cristina-pertierra%40earthlink.net> earthlink.net>

I've tried, to no avail, to locate a recent thread that included a link
regarding unschooling with regards to partners. I have to admit,
mindful parenting comes much easier than applying the philosophy to my
relationship with DH. If someone would be so kind to repost where I can
find that info. I'd really appreciate it. And so would DH :0). Thanks.

-=-=-=-=-

Yeah---that happens a lot when we don't change the subject line. Things
morph so much from post to post.

I can recommend a yahoo group that focuses on applying the philosophy
to our spouses:

http://groups. <http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Peacefulpartnerships>
yahoo.com/group/Peacefulpartnerships

It's run by radical unschooling parents, so the philosophy is pretty
set.

Dealing with spouses seems so much harder then with our children. I
don't post much there, but I spend a lot of time reading! Every little
bit helps! <g>

~Kelly
